It's Your Turn - 365 Ways to Give Donate Today
Every day should be a day of giving We want to hear from you on ways to give back Click on Contact Us and submit your idea on the contact form Pay the persons toll behind you Send a Thank You card to your local fire/police station Send an e-card to a friend Pay for two movie tickets for a stranger Volunteer at a local shelter Hug someone Put a note in your childs lunch box Leave your change in the vending machine for the next person Rake an elderly persons lawn Give a smile Read to a kid Visit the elderly Give clothes to your local shelter Buy a friend a soft drink Buy a friend lunch Give your dog a bone Give your waitress/waiter a nice tip even when they dont deserve it and leave them a note to encourage them Take your spouse out for no special reason and tell them you love them Donate books to after-school programs Upgrading your computer? Donate your old one Pick up litter Make a wish come true Sing at the Senior Citizens center (even if you cant sing) Organize a clothes drive to help someone in your community Pay the persons grocery bill in front of you Pay for a strangers dinner Leave a coupon on an item at the grocery store Send your friend an anonymous gift Roll an elderly persons garbage can to the streets Help serve dinner at a soup kitchen Have a toy drive for a local hospital Start a journal on giving for each member of the family to contribute Visit the elderly and journal their memories this will be a nice Christmas gift you can give to their grandchildren Write a note of appreciation to your teacher Make your parents breakfast in bed Do your chores without your parents telling you Adopt a senior citizen and send them cards for their birthday and Christmas Call an old friend Give a houseplant to your teacher (Sunday School or Public School) Give a compliment Drop coins in parking meters that will soon expire Build a home with Habitat for Humanity Volunteer at a local non-profit Write a Thank You note to someone who has made a difference in your life Pick up trash in your community Give a homeless person a gift card to a fast food restaurant in the area Teach others about giving Tutor a child in school If you are a service provider, give free service once a month to a needy person Take a blanket to a homeless person during the winter Write a Thank You note to your postman Drop off your magazines at a local hospital. Dont forget to remove your name and address. Contact Us Today
